turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello! I would like to get a pizza for this evening for dinner. Can you order it for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where would you like your pizza from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about Marzonnis? Are they open on Monday evenings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Im sorry, Marzonnis is closed on Mondays. Is there another pizza place you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, try Ciao Bella.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ciao Bella's is open. What kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like one of their BBQ pizzas with the white sauce on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one with the Blue cheese dressing?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, One of those with the thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the largest they make, is it a large?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, they do an xtra large which has 14 slices.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, an extra large BBQ pizza with thin crust. Can they put bacon on instead of chicken?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I can order it with Bacon instead of chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, can you go ahead and order that for me please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I have an extra large BBQ pizza with thin crust and bacon instead of chicken from Ciao Bella.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, sounds good!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! It is ordered and should be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, just have them charge my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. Your receipt will be sent by text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Youre welcome, enjoy the pizza!
